steps.description: Prepare-Prepare the filter insert by folding the paper filter in half to create a semi-circle, and in half again to create a quarter-circle
Place-Place the paper filter in the dripper
steps.modified_description: Place-Place the paper filter improperly in the dripper.

errors.description: Not properly placing the paper filter.

steps.description: Place-Place the dripper on top of a coffee mug
spread-spread open filter in dripper to create a cone
Grind-Grind the coffee beans until the coffee grounds are the consistency of coarse sand, about 20 seconds
steps.modified_description: Grind-Grind the coffee beans until the coffee grounds are the consistency of coarse sand, about 10 seconds

errors.description: Not grinding properly and grind for 10 seconds only.

steps.description: Transfer-Transfer the grounds to the filter cone
steps.modified_description: Transfer-Transfer the grounds to the filter cone and spill some.
Transfer-Transfer water to a kettle and spill some.

errors.description: Spill some out of the kettle.

steps.description: Pour-Pour a small amount of water into the filter to wet the grounds
steps.modified_description: Pour-Pour a large amount of water into the filter to wet the grounds.

errors.description: Using large amount of water instead of small.

steps.description: Wait-Wait about 30 seconds for the coffee to bloom. (You will see small bubbles or foam on the coffee grounds during this step.)
steps.modified_description: Wait-Wait about 10 seconds for the coffee to bloom. (You will see small bubbles or foam on the coffee grounds during this step.)

steps.description: pour-Slowly pour the rest of the water over the grounds in a circular motion. Do not overfill beyond the top of the paper filter
drain-Let the coffee drain completely into the mug before removing the dripper
steps.modified_description: Drain-remove the dripper before coffee drains completely.

errors.description: removing the dripper before the coffee drains completely.

steps.description: Boil-Boil the water. (While the water is boiling, assemble the filter cone)

check-Once the water has boiled, check the temperature of the water. (The water should be between 195-205 degrees Fahrenheit or between 91-96 degrees Celsius. If the water is too hot, let it cool briefly.)
steps.modified_description: check-Once the water has boiled, check the temperature of the water. (The water should be between 180 - 190 degrees Fahrenheit or between 82-87 degrees Celsius. If the water is too hot, let it cool briefly.)

errors.description: Using less than the desired temperature.

steps.description: Discard-Discard the paper filter and coffee grounds
